review: I bought two of Fire TVs in December 15th, one for me and one for my parents as a Christmas gift but the package got lost in the mail, I reported it and finally got it last Monday... way too late for Christmas.Anyway, I finally got to install mine. Very easy... plug two cables, done!. After a few minutes I was already watching my shows. Excellent picture, super-fast downloading and very easy to use menus. The voice search worked very well for me, even with my accent.I tried to listen to my cloud Prime playlists shortly after I first installed it, but it wouldn't find them, even after I did a "sync". I guess it needed a while to read all my information from the cloud, because I tried again three days later and all my music was available.The lack of and on/off button was a little disconcerting but I figured I just had to let it go to sleep by itself.Overall, this is much better than the other devices I've been using to stream Amazon content (X-box, Sony bluray) and I'm happy with my purchase. Now, if I had got it two days after I ordered it (as I was supposed to) it would had been perfect.
